overview:
Currently Patrick Bradley is the Founder and CEO of Filter Platforms Inc., a technology based company that builds online businesses that target professional and semi-professional creative audiences. The mission is to be the leading company worldwide helping creative individuals and companies gain mass exposure and make money.

The company’s Filterfoundry.com, is becoming the “hub” for individuals and companies worldwide in all creative career fields and is on a mission to become the most important business social platform, with cloud-level mobile apps, for visual artists, musicians, creative agencies and studios worldwide to: connect, collaborate, teach/learn and hire. FilterFoundry.com, described as the “Visual LinkedIn for the creative industries”, will also connect its creative members to related transaction oriented online businesses owned and operated by the company.

As an entrepreneur Patrick has been ahead of the curve, with successes including a start-up, digital creative agency, Zentopy, which hit $80 million in annual revenue in four years and was acquired by (IPG) The Interpublic Group of Cos. Patrick has executive produced award-winning feature films and over 50 hours of TV programming. He also works with Facing Forward Foundation (www.facingforward.org), for which he serves as an executive fundraiser.
